name: Anyplace Poker Offline. Texas Holdem with friends
name_original: Anyplace Poker Offline. Texas Holdem with friends
description:
Great app to play Texas Holdem on one device. Complete substitution for poker room: table, cards, chips and dealer/croupier.

The app regularly hits TOP RANKS in card games in App Store in many countries!

1. The game is FREE! No need to buy chips in the app.

2. Internet connection or WiFi are NOT required. Play anywhere.

 3. Customize to your needs: Set any size of small and big blind.

4. Any size of initial buy-in. Additional buy-in is possible between hands (it’s FREE).

5. Like in real poker room: Players can leave the table between hands and new players can join the game.

 6. Convenient to play even with small screen size: if needed, just pinch in / pinch out (like in web browser) to scale table size.

7. Great design.
